solution_line_template: If each of them stayed {num_nights} nights, the total cost per person is ${cost_per_night_per_person}/night * {num_nights} nights = $<<{cost_per_night_per_person}*{num_nights}={cost_per_person}>>{cost_per_person}
Since they were three, the combined cost is ${cost_per_person} + ${cost_per_person} + ${cost_per_person} = $<<{cost_per_person}+{cost_per_person}+{cost_per_person}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
